name: Android Explorer
body:
# AndroidExplorer

Android File Explorer on Windows
Apache 2.0 License

## ScreenShot

![ScreenShot en](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Kuchinashi/AndroidExplorer/gh-pages/images/ss_en1.png)

## Download

latest binary ver 1.0.6-alpha

https://github.com/Kuchinashi/AndroidExplorer/raw/master/AndroidExplorer-1.0.6-alpha.msi

Changelog

https://github.com/Kuchinashi/AndroidExplorer/blob/master/CHANGELOG

## Update

### 1.0.6-alpha from 1.0.5-alpha or earlier

Uninstall 1.0.5-alpha or earlier and install 1.0.6-later.

## Quick Documents

1. Key Event

|F2|Rename the selected item.|
|F5|Refresh file list.|
|Del|Delete the selected item(s).|

1. Context Menu

 1. Refresh file list.
 1. Download the selected item(s).
 1. Delete the selected item(s).
 1. Rename file

1. Drag and Drop

Drag and Drop the file(s) or folder(s) of Windows, to push the current location of the Android Explorer.

1. Text box in the lower right

Move directly to the directory.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
